text: The Day After is an American television movie. It was first shown on ABC on November 20, 1983. Over 100 million people watched the movie when it was first shown. When it was first shown, it caused a lot of controversy and discussion due to what it was about and what it showed. The movie is about a fictional nuclear war between the United States and the Soviet Union. It follows several citizens and the people they see after a nuclear attack on Lawrence, Kansas and Kansas City, Missouri. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:English-language movies Category:1983 science fiction movies Category:Television movies Category:Disaster movies Category:American television movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Apocalyptic movies Category:Movies about nuclear war and weapons Category:Cold War movies Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Meyer
